page.title: 03EDUCATION:PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content: EDUCATION: MANOD PRIMARY SCHOOL Grid Ref.: 70-44 The School was officially opened in l968 by JOHN MORRIS, H.M.I. The old Manod School is about 300 metres away by the BLAENAU-LLAN road. HEADMASTER: MR. GARETH W. WILLIAMS, Blaencwm, Caeclyd- appointed in Jan. l982 from a Dyfed school. Trained at TRINITY COLLEGE,CARMARTHEN. Deputy: MR. DYLAN ROBERTS- appointed Sept. l982 from LLAN FFESTINIOG SCHOOL. Trained at the NORMAL COLLEGE, BANGOR. STAFF: Mrs. Marian Roberts (l982) Mrs. Anwen Mair Jones(l960) Mrs. Lisabeth Emma Parry (l973-85) pupils taught by the 3 teachers are: 7+/8+=12 boys,11 girls; 5,6,7+=13b,11g; 4,5+=11b,5g. TOTAL ROLL:91. 64 HOMES use WELSH as the 1st language;27 use English. continued p.4
